name: BrainPunk
description:
BrainPunk is a 1-bit cyberpunk brain game.

Instruction: Just follow the story, type your answer and progress ahead (using next button)

To play the game - https://animator.github.io/brain_punk

Source - https://github.com/animator/brain_punk

Original Storyboard. Modern Twist on some classic puzzles.

The images used in this game are programatically generated (using prompt to image AI) or  custom drawn using image editors. To ensure 1-bit, the images were further processed using self developed image processing codes that implement dithering.

Answer to all the questions can be found in this data file.
